sentences.english: Think of this technique in terms of rhetoric.
sentences.chinese: 用修辞手法描述一下这种技术。

sentences.english: Stylist was not immersed in general understanding to apply this to behave gimmick. However painterly combination effect.
sentences.chinese: 设计师没有陷入一般理解去运用这一表现手法。

sentences.english: Finally in order to tap playing technique applied to affected part and the end of the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 最后以轻叩打手法施于患处而结束治疗。

sentences.english: However, Li Keran maintained traditional Chinese brushstroke techniques and painting skills.
sentences.chinese: 然而，李可染的画法又靠了传统笔画的表现手法。

sentences.english: This is the strategy of retrospective anticipation.
sentences.chinese: 这就是返顾预测的手法。

sentences.english: A unique narrative strategy is to narrative drama of a pioneering approach.
sentences.chinese: 全剧独特的叙事策略是对电视剧叙事手法的一种开拓。

sentences.english: Afterwards, pecking-acupuncture technique was done on Renzhong (GV 26) to achieve strong stimulation for 10 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 继续针刺人中，施雀啄手法强刺激10下。

sentences.english: Press your thumb to the muscle from the top of haunch outside with the same method as above.
sentences.chinese: 用同样的手法，从臀部顶向外侧把拇指压进肌肉。

sentences.english: Use slice cutting on the side section by the angle of the section.
sentences.chinese: 发片与分区角度拉出以滑剪手法处理。

sentences.english: Black boxes make it tough to reverse-engineer the equipment.
sentences.chinese: “黑盒子”手法使得中方难以对设备进行反向开发。

sentences.english: The director cleverly atmosphered the film for added chills.
sentences.chinese: 导演手法巧妙地着意渲染使电影更增添恐怖气氛。

sentences.english: Theadoption of figures of speech is an important part composing the form of literary texts.
sentences.chinese: 而修辞手法的应用也是小说形式的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Hence, we relied on unique painterly manipulation of live action.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们依靠独特的绘画手法的生活行动。

sentences.english: Objective To reform traditional method of preoperative washing hands.
sentences.chinese: 目的改革传统的手术前洗手法。

sentences.english: Homosexuals have also made it a practice to dump on religious leaders.
sentences.chinese: 同性恋者也以诘难宗教领袖为惯用手法。

sentences.english: The technique and maneuver abided by the mechanics regulation.
sentences.chinese: 针法和手法遵循力学规则。
